name: hoobot
description: Hoobot is reactive algorithmic crypto trading bot with suport for OpenAI GPT and many other indicators.

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" pm2 start node --name app-production -- build/hoobot.js
scripts.start:development: npm run build:development && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" pm2 start node --name app-development --instances 1 -- build-dev/hoobot.js
scripts.simulate: cross-env SIMULATE="true" NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" pm2 start node --name app-simulate --instances 1 -- build/hoobot.js
scripts.stop: pm2 stop app-production && pm2 delete app-production && pm2 save --force
scripts.stop:development: pm2 stop app-development && pm2 delete app-development && pm2 save --force
scripts.stop:simulate: pm2 stop app-simulate && pm2 delete app-simulate && pm2 save --force

author: Toni Lukkaroinen
